module.name: part_template_extension
module.keywords: module, electrical, pattern, template, electronic, shape property, acid trap, material addition features, parametric curve, layout, conductor, trace, route

abstract.li: Path based parametric curve including optional start, end and corner conditions;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the geometric properties of material as constrained by a shape. The shape information included is parametric, and path based. The parameters are consistent among all segments in the path. The representation is harmonized with other industry standard representations of geometric curves used in CAD systems. This part of ISO 10303 includes information necessary to describe the different types of templates that provide the shape and other property information for the feature to be used in the design of the interconnect substrate.

inscope.li: Path based parametric curve including optional start, end and corner conditions;
items within the scope of application module Fabrication technology, ISO/TS 10303-1670;
items within the scope of application module Fill area style, ISO/TS 10303-1672;
items within the scope of application module Layered 2d shape, ISO/TS 10303-1693;
items within the scope of application module Text representation, ISO/TS 10303-1750.

outscope.li: Multiple segments with different properties for each segment combined into one shape.

sc.description: All members of this constraint maps to entity with additional constraints in the mapping, except and . All of them require UNIQUE string for ., so ONEOF subtype constraint from ARM is guaranteed as not violated, except . Latter case is covered by pte_part_template_definition_subtypes constraint.
